DOC.brief_summary: Mild therapeutic hypothermia is indicated in patients surviving out-of-hospital cardiac arrest due to ventricular fibrillation. Potential immunologic responses are unknown.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Mild Therapeutic Hypothermia on Leukocyte Count
DOC.criteria: Survivors of cardiac arrest due to VF Age 1890 Suspected / proven pregnancy Immunodeficiency
